Then:  
> find --set-root /vista.tag  
> chainloader /BOOTMGR  

The above is very basic, as said you should read a bit and learn grub4dos syntax, then use it (and NOT attempt to invent your own :wink:).

* The **P** BR or **V**BR is part of the partition/volume.
* If you chainload - by whatever means - a loader (like with chainloader /bootmgr) the CODE in the PBR is NOT used in ANY way, ONLY the DATA (BPB or Bios Parameter Block) in it is used.
